articles.author: Dr. Ambrish Mithal
articles.title: Are people with diabetes more likely to have osteoporosis, bone fractures? - The Indian Express
articles.description: People with uncontrolled, long-standing diabetes have poor quality bones, which fracture easily. They have lower muscle mass, which indirectly impacts their bone strength, and also makes them more prone to falling and breaking a bone, explains Dr Ambrish Mith…
